column1: Trump is doing the same thing with COVID19 he’s done with other crisis’s and corruption. Sweep it under the rug, pretend it’s not really happening, demand silence about the truth, tell his cult he’s solved it while people DIE across the country. Blame OTHERS/Dems, Pence & China

COVID19 STARTS as an URI before fails quickly moving into the lungs in more serious cases. Over 80% of COVID19 patients don’t advance to that point-HOWEVER, they are EXTREMELY contagious & risk passing it to high risk patients.
Just Googled "can cats get coronavirus"... and the answer was probably no, and I don't like that the articles all kept saying "probably."
